org.gcn.plinguacore.util.psystem.rule.checkRule

Class DecoratorCheckRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gcn.plinguacore.util.psystem.rule.checkRule.DecoratorCheckRule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultiEnvironment, NoCharges, NoConstant, NoCooperation, NoCooperationWithDivision, NoCreation, NoDifferentMainLabels, NoDissolution, NoDivision, NoEmptyLeftMultiSet, NoEvolution, NoGeneStrings, NoLeftExternalMultiSet, NoLeftInnerMembranes, NoMultipleProduction, NoMultipleProductionWithDivision, NoPriority, NoRepeatedLabels, NoRightExternalMultiSet, NoRightInnerMembranes, NotAllEmptyMultiSet, SymmetricCommunication

    public abstract class DecoratorCheckRule
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the basic functionality for all CheckRule instances which wrap another instance, as specified by Decorator pattern
    See Also:

      • DecoratorCheckRule

        public DecoratorCheckRule()
        Creates a new DecoratorCheckRule instance, which checks only the restrictions defined on itself.

      • DecoratorCheckRule

        public DecoratorCheckRule(CheckRule cr)
        Creates a new DecoratorCheckRule instance, which wraps cr as stated by Decorator pattern. Thus, it will be capable to test both the instance restrictions and cr restrictions
        Parameters:
        cr - the CheckRule instance to be wrapped
